message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe you'll find valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $14,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product and I'm willing to pay up to $13,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm confident this product offers you even more value than that. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can still negotiate further. Would $12,500 be acceptable for you?
